Ótimo jogo. Cheio de desafios. Para quem curte um bom quebra cabeças e o ideal.

This game is one of the best games I`ve played, the puzzles are smart and have a perfect progression of difficulty, the hidden lore is genial and you nemesis have a delightful personality.

What to say about this game? It's a classic!
One of the first indie games I played, and one of the bests I played so far. 
The background story is amazing, the background musics are amazing, the game resources are amazing, the game characters are amazing, and the ending... Oh, the ending is amazing...
The game isn't so difficult. That is the only con i have against portal, but the challenge chambers compensate this...

I played Portal 2 before this one, and I have to say that the main game is a breeze if you played Portal 2 before. But what I found very interesting is that some chambers were very fun and dinamic, I liked some chambers a lot better than most chambers in Portal 2. This game is very simple, and that is something that I loved since the second game becomes pretty complex later on, but it proves a nice challenge (especially if you are a completionist).
All in all, very short but very fun game. Try Portal 2 if you are in for a longer and harder game, but this one has some very fun levels to offer:D
Make portal 3.

Portal and Portal 2 are two of the best games ever. Portal is basically a prelude to the second part, very short but worth playing. Original, fun, marvellously complex and with a really good storyline they are some of the best all time classics. Absolutely woth buying.

Możliwość teleportacji w życiu byłaby niezwykle przydatna. Moglibyśmy w bardzo łatwy sposób wykonywać codzienne czynności, takie jak np. robienie zakupów.

Ta gra umożliwia nam teleportację, jednakże nie możemy jej używać w dowolny sposób. Jesteśmy bowiem w tajnym laboratorium Aperture Science, gdzie obserwuje nas Glados, która ukara każdą próbę ucieczki na wolność. Celem głownej bohaterki jest wydostanie się na wolność przy użyciu portali, co może nie być aż takie proste, jak się na początku wydaje.

Cała gra ma zabawną i ciekawą fabułę, łamigłowki bywają dosyć trudne, jednakże polecam tę grę każdemu, kto ma chwilę wolnego czasu i parę euro na steam.

This was the first game I bought on steam around 7 years ago decided to play it again today and the story and puzzles never get old. If this game had a graphics update you wouldn't even be able to tell that it was released 15 years ago. I Highly recommend this game to anyone who likes puzzle games or really anyone and everyone. I also recommend buying the sequel Portal 2 and we can only wish that one of the games Valve Software is working on at the moment is Portal 3. As Making this series a Trilogy is just what we need.

开脑洞的游戏，不得不为V社的别出心裁点个赞！

1.游戏性：
虽然是经典的第一人称射击类型，但是游戏中没有任何可以给你“杀死“的敌人，手中的传送门枪也没有任何攻击力，有的只是通过开出的传送门和身边的小方块来破解一个个迷局，从而去探求这一切背后的秘密。

2.剧情：
继承了V社游戏一贯的风格，即使通关也只能解到了整个世界观的一部分。但是一个个神秘的实验室，步步推进的剧情，却是促使玩家去揭开这一切秘密的动力。

3.BOSS：
不得不说，传送门的BOSS是我见我最有特点且与众不同的BOSS之一，尤其是从情感上来说。多的就不说了，期待你们也去尝试一下。

This game gave me a gun that shot different colored circles. It was pretty cool. 

There was also some robot lady that kept talking about how I wasn't good for anything, it reminded me of my childhood which was great because I love being a slave to nostalgia like that.

先玩的2 所以1基本就是2个半小时通关的。有些人说2不如1好玩，我觉得没道理啊，1的内容很少，2不但长了四倍左右还有联机合作关。而且我认为两部的故事很连贯，明明是个解谜游戏，制作团队在游戏背景和情节上也是下了一番功夫，尤其是BOSS的性格真的突出，这一切又在2里做了补充和解释。so，要玩就2个一起玩！！

I went in blind, even though I had watched a playthrough a year or two prior. This is the first game I bought on Steam. I bought the 1&2 bundle actually.

As many have before me, I could probably go on for PAGES about this game, but I'll just put it simply.

If you like first person-puzzle-shooters with amazingly voice acted, witty dialogue, this game is for you.
Un clásico moderno de Valve, buena historia :)

FPS and puzzles: a great combination. This game has almost everything it needs to be a great game. I would have appreciate a better cared lore, or a story which woud have allowed us to know our protagonist's story and the plot of the society we work (work?) for. It may be simply to resolve but it is tricky and requires some reasoning.
Short game but every level was incredibly fun!

Juego 10/10, de esos juegos que solo te trae Valve una vez cada 10 años... Ese juego que tienes que jugar antes de morir... Una de las 10 maravillas de los videojuegos asegurada.
Something great, something diffirent than typical fps if I can call this game FPS, I'm not sure but is fun.... and cake is not a lie I eat it all.

Portal is a  very simple but yet advanced game. It is probably the best puzzle game i have ever played with an amazing story filled with hard to solve puzzles. Buying portal today is going to give you around 4-5 hours of main story puzzels and probably another 5-10 hours of co-op gameplay and custom maps made by players. Portal is probably not the longest game ever, but it is for sure one of my top enjoyable ''mini-games'' out there. I will forever remember some of the items and characters in this game. Portal is worth every single dollar i paid. I recommend this game so highly. 

overall rating - 9/10

很有意思的一款游戏，本来是想玩2的，发现1也很便宜，就一并买了。

玩过不少解密类游戏，不过主视角的倒是第一次接触，上手之后很是喜欢。

游戏流程不算太长，以关卡的形式进行倒也颇显紧凑，然而问题是，游戏难度并不高，掌握技巧之后，游戏后期因玩法的简单而导
致的枯燥乏味也格外明显，重复的操作以及游戏中途的几乎没有的剧情使得游戏整体体验大打折扣。

尽管如此，这仍然是一款值得一玩的游戏，新颖的题材与玩法是最大的特点，结尾的剧情也令人意犹未尽（据说这是修改之后的结局，原版我并没有玩过）剧情我就不剧透了，本来就那么点，还是自己体会比较好！

推荐给喜欢解密类游戏的、喜欢挑战自我的以及喜欢尝试新题材游戏的玩家。

评分：[b]8.5[/b]/10
COMPRA EL PUTO JUEGO.

Had an issue with the objects. They are weightless and and had problems in the final part when needed a cube to climb as it would constantly disappear through the ground.

9/10 Portal 2 was better
A very good game with very few shortcomings. A very nice purchase as a part  of some pack (Valve pack or The Orange Box) during a sale.

入Steam 大法后第一个通关的游戏，非常棒，当结尾从压抑昏暗的地下机械世界逃出到阳光明媚的地球表面，才真正感受到了自由。

玩的过程中时间一长就会出现眩晕，因此不推荐长时间玩。最好是把关卡分散开进行。对射击类游戏的兴趣不大，因此之前接触的FPS游戏较少，也不是对射击类感冒，但是传送门把射击的形与解密的魂非常完美的结合在了一起，创意十足。探讨人工智能的觉醒，传送枪酷炫的科技感，以及最后的反转，都让这个游戏成为了经典。
Un juego de Puzzles un poco complicado, historia corta pero interesante, psicodélico y bizarro.

Corto pero intenso y ¡MUY DIVERTIDO!
Los rompecabezas con portales no se vuelven nada aburridos, y además vas acompañad@ de GlaDOS, la voz robotizada que suelta unas frases dignas de cita célebre, y son gran parte de la esencia de este juego.
En serio, juégalo, no te llevará más de 3 horas y es algo por lo que todo jugador de videojuegos debe pasar, no te arrepentirás.


PD: The cake is a lie.
